channel.title: Exploring the child's world IV
channel.description:
Interviews with delinquent and disturbed young people who are encouraged to discuss their experiences and express feelings. To protect individuals, each program is a re-creation of an actual interview using different names and places.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Marie
item.description: This program focuses on children with chaotic family situations.
item.dc:creator: WDUQ (Radio station : Pittsburgh, Pa.)
item.dc:subject: Sociology

item.title: Laurie
item.description: This program focuses on Laurie, a teenger who has an unhealthy relationship with her father.
item.dc:creator: Duquesne University
item.dc:subject: Sociology

item.title: A non-care package
item.description: This program focuses on a boy who is uncared for.
item.dc:creator: WDUQ (Radio station : Pittsburgh, Pa.)
item.dc:subject: Sociology

item.title: Life is a bunch of pain
item.description: This program focuses on a boy who says he was framed on a morals charge.
item.dc:creator: WDUQ (Radio station : Pittsburgh, Pa.)
item.dc:subject: Sociology

item.title: Precocious neo-adult
item.description: This program focuses on a precocious youth who "overaspires and underachieves."
item.dc:creator: WDUQ (Radio station : Pittsburgh, Pa.)
item.dc:subject: Sociology

item.title: Troubled shooter
item.description: This program focuses on a teenage girl who shot a boy.
item.dc:creator: WDUQ (Radio station : Pittsburgh, Pa.)
item.dc:subject: Sociology

item.title: No dates after 2am
item.description: This program focuses on a teenage girl with a poor self-image and is often involved with older men.
item.dc:creator: WDUQ (Radio station : Pittsburgh, Pa.)
item.dc:subject: Sociology

item.title: Timmy
item.description: This program focuses on Timmy and the issue of the unloved child.
item.dc:creator: WDUQ (Radio station : Pittsburgh, Pa.)
item.dc:subject: Sociology

item.title: Mary Jean
item.description: This program focuses on Mary Jean and the issue of youths interacting with strangers.
item.dc:creator: WDUQ (Radio station : Pittsburgh, Pa.)
item.dc:subject: Sociology

item.title: Rocky
item.description: This program focuses on Rocky, a youth who struggles with "mascuiline identification."
item.dc:creator: WDUQ (Radio station : Pittsburgh, Pa.)
item.dc:subject: Sociology

item.title: The urban nomad
item.description: This program focuses on a teen who lives a nomadic, criminal existence.
item.dc:creator: WDUQ (Radio station : Pittsburgh, Pa.)
item.dc:subject: Sociology

item.title: Girl in a box car
item.description: This program focuses on the life of an orphan who has attempted suicide.
item.dc:creator: WDUQ (Radio station : Pittsburgh, Pa.)
item.dc:subject: Sociology

item.title: Let the world adjust to me
item.description: This program focuses on a girl who ran away from home and wound up in reform school.
item.dc:creator: WDUQ (Radio station : Pittsburgh, Pa.)
item.dc:subject: Sociology
